text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Fukuhara was born in Higashihiroshima on April 2, 1931. On January 5, 1955, when he was a Tokyo University of Education student, he debuted for the Japan national team against Burma. He played 2 games for Japan in 1955. On February 27, 1970, Fukuhara died of stomach cancer at the age of 38. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1955||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Footballers from Hiroshima Prefecture Category:Japan international footballers
title: Reizo Fukuhara
